text: The Clerk of the Senate and Clerk of the Parliaments is the chief clerk and senior administrative officer of the Senate of Canada. == List of Clerks == * 1867–1871 John Fennings Taylor Sr. * 1871–1883 Robert Le Moine * 1883–1900 Edouard-Joseph Langevin * 1900–1917 Samuel-Edmour St-Onge Chapleau * 1917–1938 Austen Ernest Blount * 1938–1955 L. Clare Moyer * 1955–1968 John Forbes MacNeill * 1968–1981 Robert Fortier * 1981–1989 Charles A. Lussier * 1989–1994 Gordon Barnhart * 1994–2009 Paul Bélisle * 2009–2015 Gary W. O'Brien * 2015–2017 Charles Robert (Interim) * 2017–2018 Nicole Proulx (Interim; first female clerk) * January 31, 2018— Richard Denis (Interim) == See also == * Clerk of the House of Commons (Canada) * Clerk of the Parliaments Category:Senate of Canada
title: Clerk of the Senate
